alert.note: Alert for Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 5:38PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Rapides and northeastern Vernon Parishes through 615 PM CDT... At 538 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Tioga to near Slagle. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Boyce, Lena, Alexandria International Airport, Ball, Lacamp, Libuse, Tioga, Timber Trails, Hutton, Esler Regional Airport, Clifton, Flatwoods, Otis, Kingsville, Sieper, Gardner, Holloway and Paradise. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 84 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
